name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Niche Finder Pro - Google and Ahrefs combined

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Analyzes a keyword and location via a Google search. Then, it combines with Ahrefs data to quickly analyze and give a rating.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Elevate your local SEO strategy with this powerful and user-friendly Chrome widget. Designed for professionals targeting keywords like towing, painting, or remodeling, this tool provides fast, comprehensive insights into keyword and location-specific data, ensuring your business stands out in local search results.

Key Features:
- Effortless Local SEO Analysis: Enter any keyword (e.g., towing, painting) and location (city, state) to instantly run an in-depth Google search tailored to your target area. 
- Instant Map Pack & SERP Insights: Quickly extract and analyze the top businesses from Google’s map pack, with review count, star rating
- Instantly identify your competition and assess the local SEO landscape.
- Ahrefs Integration: Leverage the power of Ahrefs data directly within the widget, pulling in crucial information like the number of referring domains for each competitor, helping you understand the SEO difficulty of your target keyword.
- Customizable SEO Reporting: Tailor your analysis with adjustable thresholds for referring domains and review counts, set custom connectors, and exclude specific terms, all while analyzing an unlimited number of search results.
- User-Friendly & Time-Saving: Designed with simplicity in mind, this tool is perfect for SEO professionals and business owners alike. No technical expertise required—just enter your keyword and location, and get professional-grade insights in seconds.
- Map Services Compatibility: Whether you’re on the Google search results page or the Map Services page, this widget works seamlessly, providing you with the full picture of your local SEO opportunities (see attached screenshot).

Why Use This Widget?
- Enhance Your Local SEO: Identify the best keywords for lead generation, optimize your local listings, and easily outrank your competition.
- Save Time: No need to manually sift through search results—the widget does it all for you, presenting data in a simple, easy-to-navigate format.
- Be a Pro: Whether you're just starting or looking to refine your strategy, this widget gives you the tools to excel in local search engine optimization.
- Customization: You choose the criteria that are worth comparing. 

Requirements:
- Ahrefs Account: For full functionality, an active Ahrefs account and the installed Ahrefs Chrome extension are required.

Unlock the potential of your local SEO efforts with this must-have Chrome widget. It’s your go-to tool for fast, effective, and professional-grade lead generation analysis.

Compatible with these courses:
- Job Killing by Dan Klein and Ippei Kanehara
- Digital Landlords by Nick Wood
- Badass Marketing BAM by Josh Osbourne
- Local Marketing Vault by James Bonadies and Jason McKim
- Automatic Agency by Blake Snodgrass
- Unemployable by Shiv
